General.Name: Banyan Gold Corp
General.Description: Banyan Gold Corp. engages in the exploration and development of precious metals. The company explores for gold and silver deposits. The Company's flagship asset is the AurMac Project that consists of 506 quartz mineral claims covering an area of approximately 9,230 hectares located in the Mayo Mining District, Yukon Territory. Banyan Gold Corp. was incorporated in 2010 and is headquartered in Whitehorse, Canada.
